reviews.comments: El departamento es tal cual se lo publica. Está en una excelente zona con tiendas, bares, etc,  Cercano al metro y a avenidas importantes. Pese a eso, pude descansar y dormir muy bien ya que el sitio está perfectamente aislado de ruidos. Tiene todos los elementos para hacerte sentir como en casa. Florencia fue flexible en los horarios de check in y check out, adaptándose a mi conveniencia. Sin dudas lo recomiendo y volvería de necesitarlo !!
reviews.response: Gracias Carlos!! Te espero nuevamente!

reviews.comments: todo muy bueno , el depto , el host y el barrio. todo muy muy bien.
El departamente fue lo que esperaba.  El anfitrion se ocupo de que todo estuviese perfecto.  El barrio es muy bueno.
¡Excelente anfitrión! Muy atenta y dispuesta. El departamento es tal como lo describen las fotos, muy limpio, luminoso y con muy buen gusto. Recomendado. ¡Gracias!
reviews.response: Gracias Eugenio, que tengas un buen año!

reviews.comments: Muy recomedable el departamento, muy lindo, luminoso y bien ubicado. Florencia es muy cordial y agradable en el trato. En la zona hay  mucho lugares para comer. El vecindario es muy tranquilo.

El lugar esta perfectamente ubicado. El aparta es como se ve en las fotos y hasta mas! Si no son de suramerica es mejor llevar transformadores para cargar celulares o camaras porque tuvimos que comprar uno. La vista es espectacular.
Si van a rentar carro hay que pedir el espacio de el parqueo con anticipacion!
Lindo monoambiente en una zona rodeada de lugares para salir día y noche.
reviews.response: Gracias por tu estadía.

reviews.comments: El apartamento esta muy bien localizado, a pocas cuadras del Subte y con bares, cafeterias y supermercado cercanos. Todo exactamente como mostrado en las fotografías. Nos encantó pasar unos días en este apartamento y no dudaríamos en volver! Muy buena comunicación con Florencia.
reviews.response: Gracias por tus comentarios! los espero en su proximo viaje!! Suerte!!

reviews.comments: Excelente experiencia, ubicación perfecta con varios sitios en los alrededores para desayunar. Florencia muy atenta, el departamento súper cómodo y muy bien equipado.
Excelente estadia, muy facil el contacto y servicio. Tambien muy bueno el departamento!
El departamento esta en una zona muy bella con restaurantes, cafés y muy cerca del subte. Además, es muy cómodo y todo bien preparado por Florencia. Recomiendo!

El apartamento DIVINO! El barrio PERFECTO! Florencia y sus padres nos hicieron sentir como en nuestra casa. Muy recomendable una experiencia buenísima. Nosotros necesitamos practican por que fuimos con nuestra bebe, ellos tenían todo pronto para ella. De verdad quedamos muy agradecidos.
reviews.response: GRACIAS Ceci, nos vemos la próxima!! cariños!

reviews.comments:
Florencia fue una host super agradable, se ocupo en todo momento de que no nos falte nada. Fue flexible con el horario de llegada y muy atenta en todo momento :)

El apartamento es tal como se ve en las fotos, aparte de ser muy lindo, es super limpio y un lugar muy agradable para pasar una linda estadía. 

El barrio esta muy bien ubicado, la zona es hermosa y muy pintoresca, con un montón de cafeterías, restaurantes y lugares típicos de Palermo.
Muy atenta y muy lindo barrio

Nuestra estadía en Buenos Aires fue maravillosa en buena parte gracias al lugar donde nos alojamos. El apartamento y el anfitrión llenaron completamente nuestras expectativas. Un sitio acogedor, en un barrio muy tranquilo y bello. Florencia fue muy amable y generosa, estuvo pendiente de detalles que facilitaron e hicieron más feliz nuestro viaje.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias chicos! Un gusto tenerlos! Y muy rico el dulce que nos dejaron!!! Los espero nuevamente en su próxima visita!! Besos!

reviews.comments: Florencia fue muy atenta y se adapto a nuestras necesidades de llegada y partida. El apto esta muy bien ubicado.

Fabulous spacious apartment in a great part of Palermo. Great restaurants/ cafes/ shops/metro  all within walking distance. We loved the rooftop and pool and all of Florencia’s recommendations were fantastic.
Very nice place. Great location! Florencia was very nice. A lot of walking distance restaurants and bars

Florencia’s place was as-pictured. Stayed there for two nights in January. Some nightlife nearby and much more within 20-30 minute walk. Didn’t partake in the rooftop pool, but it looked nice. Air conditioning was great. All-in-all I would likely stay again.
Very nice appartment on great location

Florencia’s space was perfect for our home base in Buenos Aires. The flat is in a great location near everything Palermo has to offer. There were great little bars and restaurants downstairs and within the surrounding blocks but getting to further spots was no problem. The flat itself was perfect with a private deck and a rooftop pool which we had to ourselves in the evenings. Pretty magical. Everything was super clean and tidy and Florencia’s mom was very nice when we met her for the key. Thank you Florencia!

Florencia's place was perfect for our trip to Buenos Aires. The location is ideal in a nice, cool neighborhood with lots of cafes, restaurants, and bars around. Her book of recommendations were also very helpful and we ended up using a lot of them.

Florencia's place is in a great neighborhood, close to great restaurants, coffee shops, shopping and more. She has a book of recommendations in her place; we went to a few of them and really enjoyed her suggestions. Her place was clean and comfortable, and her wifi is really strong.

Florencia is a great host. Communication with her was easy and she was very  helpful. The apartment is bright, modern, clean and very comfortable, and its also well equipped with everything you need for easy cooking meals, coffee machine and pots and pans. The location couldn't be better, within walking distance of beautiful restaurants and cafes, in one of the nicest parts of Palermo Hollywood. I would highly recommend this apartment for your visit to gorgeous Buenos Aires. Thank you Florencia!!
Great place
We loved Florencia’s apartment, which has a gorgeous balcony and is full of light. It was in a great location. Florencia was easy to communicate with and very helpful!
Lugar aconchegante em um bairro bem gostoso de Buenos Aires. Tudo transcorreu bem durante a hospedagem.
Lugar muito bem localizado, proximo de restaurantes, mercado, metro, recomendo.

An incredible place to stay! We loved the neighborhood - quiet and scenic, but also close to remarkable shops and dining. Everything about our stay was perfect, and we couldn't have asked for a better experience. Thank you, Florencia!
reviews.response: thanks for staying in my apartment!!

reviews.comments: Florencia and her husband welcomed us warmly to their lovely studio apartment which is quite spacious. It is close to many excellent restaurants, bars and cafes.  In the same block there are many places to have breakfast, lunch, dinner and a craft beer brewery just downstairs.

Excellent location. Great view and all you need really. Nice people but could be cleaner.
I also suggest you be clear well in advance on check in and check out arrangements as Florencia was not reachable by phone.

O apartamento é super limpo, equipado e tem uma ótima localização, com vários cafés e restaurantes em volta. A anfitriã nos respondeu sempre com prontidão e deixou no um guia com muitas dicas valiosas da cidade.

Infelizmente quando chegamos não fomos recebido no apartamento, pediram para que fossemos buscar as chaves em outro local um pouco longe (o que encareceu o uber), mas não tivemos problemas!

Recomendamos o apartamento!
reviews.response: Hola la llave la buscaron por mi departamento ya que era fuera del horario del check in ( en la madrugada) y fue avisada antes que reservará, gracias!

reviews.comments:
The apartament is pretty neat, beautiful and it's perfect for a week or two in Buenos Aires. 
We were well received by Florencia's parents and they very pretty kind to us. Our flight delayed, we spent almost 4 hours at the airport trying to exchange our money and they patiently waited for us. 
Florencia also left us some treats like alfajors and a list of places, tips and things to do in Buenos Aires. And the best part is they're not just random touristy places everyone knows about. She wants you to live and enjoy the city as true porteño.
Neighborhood is beautiful, peaceful, clean and easy to get to other places. We used the Subté (subway) almost every day and Uber every now and then...
I'm picky and I hate sleeping with too much noise or incidence of light and I'm glad I slept like a baby every day there.
My only observation is the bathroom: The toilet clogged 4 or 5 times and it was difficult to unclog it. It seems the flush doesn't have enough strenght to push the water down and it doesn't work the way it's supposed to. About the shower: If you're tall like me, you'll look like a contortionist trying to clean yourself while dodging  the shower and trying to keep a distance from the wall and the curtain.
Thanks for everything Florencia :)

Florencia' s Studio in the heart of Palermo is a fantastic place!Unfortunately, I did not meet my host but the key exchange was flawless. The place was clean and warm. Clean towels, kitchen, and bed sheets. Thank you for letting me experience Buenos Aires!
Boa localização e hospitalidade.
Ótimo local com vários restaurantes na rua do apartamento. Infraestrutura completa e com estação de metrô bem próxima, facilitando muito o deslocamento à baixo custo.

Este apartamento é extremamente bem localizado. Diversos restaurantes, mercados, bares e cafés na região. O bairro é muito agradável e seguro. Pode-se sair a pé tranquilamente.
O apartamento é confortável, limpo e possui uma ótima varanda. Tem todos utensílios necessários para uma estadia tranquila. 
Recomendo e pretendo voltar.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias!

reviews.comments: Our stay was lovely. Florencia was accommodating to our late arrival, assisted us whenever we needed her help regarding local tours, recommendations etc.  The apartment was neat and tidy, on a good street and walking distance from the subway, good restaurants, bars and shopping. Definitely will visit again:)
Great house in a perfect location. There is a rooftop pool and a nice balcony. Highly recommended for a great time in Buenos Aires.
This a great place. Close to everything and easy to get around. Great craft beer place just next to it. Florencia was helpful and responded to request immediately.

O apartamento é limpo e confortável, porém, pela manhã, a claridade que entra pela cozinha pode atrapalhar um pouco aqueles que gostam de dormir até mais tarde. Fica localizado numa rua tranquila, arborizada e repleta de cafés e bistrôs deliciosos. A anfitriã nos recebeu muito bem através da Perla, que foi muito atenciosa e receptiva. Recomendo!

First time in BA & I was so lucky to have found Florencia's flat. A super flat to stay for few days or more, close from all the cool places in Palermo. Great value for money. Florencia has been very helpful & available for tips. I recommend this place without any doubt.
reviews.response: Thanks!! Frederic!! have a good time.

reviews.comments: Great location! Great loft! Great host!
Great apartment! Clean and beautiful, airy with lots of natural light, great amenities and great location! Highly reccommend!

L'appartement et sa terrasse sont parfaits pour passer un séjour génial. 
Florencia est à l'écoute de ses hôtes autant que les gens qui travaillent avec elle :) 
La situation de l'appartement est parfaite
Had a great time here. Very nice apartment

Nossa estadia foi muito boa. Florencia estava de férias, mas respondeu todas as mensagem muito rápido e deixou uma pessoa encarregada de nos receber e apresentar o espaço.

Quando chegamos encontramos água, café, açúcar, chá, e doces. A casa estava limpa, com toalhas e roupa de cama em perfeita ordem. 

O local fica ao lado de pelo menos 3 cafeteiras, um restaurante, uma micro cervejaria e uma casa de sorvetes. Há 4 ou 5 quadras existe uma estação de metro e supermercados "chinos" com preços muito bons para comprar vinhos e necessidades básicas. 

A noite há muito movimento no bairro, cheio de pessoas e restaurantes incríveis. Nos sentimos a vontade para andar a qualquer horários pelo bairro.

Meu único ponto negativo (e são pontos negativos pequenos, ok) em relação a casa é a banheira que poderia estar em melhores condições de uso. Um dos ganchos de toalha da porta caíram durante a nossa estadia (ao que peço desculpas), pois ambos estão mal encaixados, acredito que somente por uma questão de uso cotidiano.

O ar condicionado faz toda diferença para os dias quentes de verão e a sacada é grande o suficiente para sentar e tomar um vinho.

A área externa com uma pequena piscina e uma churrasqueira aparentemente estava passando por reparos, em todo caso não tive tempo de usufruir desse espaço.

Recomendo esse local. Eu mesmo ficaria aqui novamente sem problemas, o custo beneficio é um dos melhores que encontrei nas minhas pesquisas.

Florencia has a beautiful apartment!  The treetop balcony gets lots of morning sunlight. The location is perfect for cafés, bars, restaurants, nightlife and shopping. Palermo "Hollywood " definitely one of the best neighborhoods to stay when visiting BA.
Lovely and clean apartment with a nice balcony and a sunny rooftop. We had a great communication with Florencia and everything went very smooth. Can highly recommend this apartment.
Florencia was a great host! Even though our flight was very delayed she was flexible and cool about it. The apartment is very nice, and the neighborhood is great!

Florencia truly went above and beyond to help us feel more comfortable during our stay, including transporting us in her car between two apartments and helping us with luggage because it was raining and we have a baby.

The apartments we had were as advertised: modern, clean, and in great locations; surrounded by cozy coffee shops and trendy restaurants/bars. I highly recommend Florencia's apartments for anyone wants to make Palermo their home base to explore BA.

This a lovely place,looks just like the pictures. It is light and airy and in a great location with cafes and restaurants everywhere. Francesca was flexible and always available to respond to any queries and her mother who let me in was also very kind. Would definitely love to stay again if I visit Buenos Aires.
o apartamento é tão confortável e charmoso que às vezes era difícil sair para conhecer a cidade. recomendo!

the bed is fantastic, the view from the balcony a dream... and the interior design is absolutely tasteful.
florencia is very nice and uncomplicated.
The apartment is in a great location in Palermo, super close to restaurants and shops. Florencia was super helpful and attentive during our stay. We had a great time.

Providenciou tudo que eu precisava como berço e aquecedor! Tudo nos conformes e tem política ótima com respeito a check In e out! Muito bem posicionado pois pra pegar o metrô era rápido, e para acessar a parte gastronômica também era ótimo, afinal, o apartamento é perto de muitos bons restaurantes!

Das Apartment von Florencia entsprach komplett unseren Erwartungen. Es liegt perfekt in einem gepflegten Stadtteil mit vielen Cafes, Bars und Restaurants in der Nähe. Die U-Bahn ist ebenfalls sehr nah. Der Balkon lädt zum Frühstück in der Sonne ein. Die Ausstattung ist sehr gut. Bei Fragen haben wir immer direkt eine Antwort erhalten. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und empfehlen das Apartment uneingeschränkt weiter.

We had an incredible stay at Flor's beautiful studio apartment. Perfectly located on a quiet corner in Palermo, in striking distance to incredible restaurants, the subway, and shopping districts. Across the street you have your own wonderful Parisian cafe, which serves brunch on the weekends til 8pm! (helping you sleep in after your 1am BsAs dinners!) Flor is a great host, willing to help in any way you need her. Don't think twice about this place, book it and enjoy your time in one of the world's great cities.
reviews.response: Gracias fue muy lindo tenerlos! Buena vuelta!

reviews.comments: Florencia responds immediately. Her apartment is clean, tasteful, and very well-located. I very much recommend it!
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Beautiful apartment at an absolutely great location. Especially enjoyed the morning sun on the balcony.
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Great host meet us with her daughter as she spoke English- very welcoming and friendly- even gave us a list of places to go - personal recommendations. Great place, awesome location close to cafes, bars, resturants- even aloud us to have a late check out - would strongly recommend staying at this place.

Great location, apartment had a light and spacious feel.

Florencia was out of town, her parents met us .  They were helpful (we had no spanish, they had no English but we communicated well).  Florencia was able to arrange for our luggage to be left at another apartment at the end of our stay because we had a late flight which was really helpful of her.

The bed is comfortable, shower is good, kitchen is minimal - was not a problem for us.

Rooftop area was a nice place to go.
Laundry upstairs but nowhere to dry wet clothes or towels.

Close to Ministro Carranza subway and lots of breakfast spots. Easy walk to good dinner choices.

The apartment was great value.  A couple of little things showing wear and tear that might have been annoying if you were paying a lot more, but we were very happy and recommend it.

Best place to stay while in Buenos Aires! The apartment is perfect in every way, so comfortable we felt like home! Haven't met Florencia but she made sure everything was perfect for us. I love the location... Close to the subte so it makes It so easy to walk around town. Definetly staying here next time we go To BsAs :-)

We had a great time at the apartment. Really well located in Palermo Hollywood with the best breakfast place right across the street. The apartment was very clean and equipped with everything you need. Florencia waited for us although our flight was late and we couldn't contact her. Definitely recommended!
I had an excellent stay at Florencia's place. Florence was very responsive and helpful and I felt very comfortable!
reviews.response: Gracias! Por tus sugerencias! Buena vuelta!

reviews.comments: I never met Florencia personally but she had arranged things perfectly for my arrival. Also she was really flexible since I mixed up things with the dates and she accommodated me easily. Communication with her was extremely quick and easy! I has a great time in Florencia's apartment. It was  bright, quiet and really charming. From the terrace you can barely see the street from the beautiful and tall trees. The pool is super convenient in summer time and I had it all for myself most of the time. Finally the neighborhood is within one of the coolest parts of town with lots of restaurants, bars at shops close by. I already look forward to going back!
Very nice apartment, exactly as described. Florencia made it very easy to get the key. Great location in Palmero, close to some wonderful cafes and restaurants.
Had a great time in the apartment, was the perfect place to enjoy Palermo. Florencia was very helpful and when we come back we would love to stay here again.

Florencia's place makes for a fantastic stay in Buenos Aires. It is perfectly clean, perfectly outfitted, and the balcony and roof top access defy expectation. We were incredibly happy with both the apartment and its location. Florencia is very prompt in her responses to questions as well. All around, an excellent choice.
reviews.response: Thanks! Have a good time! And a happy year!

reviews.comments: Certainly would recommend a stay in this AirBnB above the treetops. The space was very modern and had every amenity we needed for a week-long stay. A lovely street in Palermo close to the subway, train, and bus lines. The roof is great. Many cafes in close proximity. Florencia was very easy to communicate with in arranging everything. The accommodations were certainly as described in the post. We had a great stay!

Our stay at Florencia's apartment took a false start as the electricity in the neighbourhood didn't work upon our arrival, thus the elevator didn't work either. As the apartment is at the 4th floor, we kind of lost all hopes, but Florencia was so nice to help us out with the suitcases, just lovely! Apart from that tiny 'act of God' we had a terrific stay! The rooftop terazza is magnificent! All necessities were provided and Florencia could be reached at any time through (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) if we needed anything. Definitely will stay here again and will recommand all my friend to book this studio in the perfect neighbourhood of Palermo Hollywood.
reviews.response:
Serena lamentablemente estos cortes de luz exeden de mi responsabilidad ya que son cortes de luz que realizaron los que nos suministran el servicio a todo el neighbourhood Palermo! 
gracias por tu evaluación! gracias!

reviews.comments: The Palermo neighbourhood is by far my favourite! Directly across the street is the best café in town and many amazing restaurants and bars within close walking distance. The condo is clean and comfortable and the area is very quiet for sleeping. Florencia and her husband were very helpful with check in, even waiting up for us as we arrived late due to our flight delays. The rooftop pool was also amazing! Thank you, Florencia, for such a wonderful stay!
reviews.response: Gracias! Felices fiestas!! Buen año!

reviews.comments: Our stay at Florencia's apartment was wonderful! The location is ideal and the apartment is very modern . Florencia was also very responsive and easy to communicate with. I would highly recommend staying here!
reviews.response: Thanks!! Have a happy new year!!

reviews.comments: Perfect location. Lovely apartment close to great breakfasts and easy strolls to some of the city's best restaurants and bars. Quick response to our same day request had us sipping Malbec on the beautiful balcony swiftly and efficiently. Highly recommended.
reviews.response: Gracias! Que tengan un buen año!

reviews.comments: Florencia's flat was a great choice! Super sunny, airy, and comfy bed. Also, great location with a short walk to the metro and the great Oui Oui cafe on doorstep (had breakfast here 3 times in 5 days!). Would definitely recommend
reviews.response: Gracias! Que tengan un lindo año!!

reviews.comments: Florencia was a wonderful host. She was very helpful and always available to answer any questions. The apartment is in the best part of town to stay and is a lovely little oasis (especially the leafy balcony) from the busy streets. Great little cafes, restaurants and bars in the area. An incredible place to explore Buenos Aires from!
reviews.response: Thanks!!! Very much! Es un placer para mi recibir gente y poder atenderlos como si estuvieran en su casa!! Great!

reviews.comments:
O apartamento é exatamente como mostram as fotos. Local espaçoso, limpo, e muito confortável. Fica localizado em um bairro incrível de Buenos Aires, rodeado de bons restaurantes e cafés, além de estar muito próximo a estação de trem e metrô do bairro.

A Florencia nos deu todo o suporte durante nosso período de hospedagem, uma simpatia em pessoa!

Com certeza na nossa próxima visita a cidade ficaremos hospedados nesse apartamento :)
reviews.response: Gracias!

reviews.comments: Fantastic place to stay! A bit further from the main center but Palermo is wonderful place as a base for exploring. Lots of great restaurants are nearby and Florencia was so helpful in contacting us. It was safe around this area where we walked around at night time but still took precautions. Apartment was clean and had enough space for the two of us and our luggage. Thank you so much Florencia!!
reviews.response: Thanks very much!!!

reviews.comments: Our stay at Florencia's was AMAZING! The appartment is beautiful, and we loved the balcony. The location is great : close to restaurants and bars, but also calm at night. Thank you!
reviews.response: Thanks so much!!!

reviews.comments: Very clean and lovely place located in a very nice and convenient location. Balcony is level with the tree tops and is my favorite feature.

Florencia was a communicative and wonderful host! She met us at a time that was convenient for us and helped us get our bearings of the neighborhood, including where to do laundry and get groceries.

The apartment was very nice, especially the bed. The bathroom was good as well, but the hot water heater is a bit small.

There are some great restaurants in the area. It's easy to turn the wrong way as you come out of the apartment and head away from them. I recommend spending an hour or so walking in all directions and taking it all in.

We really enjoyed the cozy apartment, especially the balcony. (The balcony had a nice table with two super comfortable chairs. We loved sitting out there in the morning). It gets great light and was exactly as shown in the pictures. It is very close to a stop for the subte, making it easier to get to the more touristy areas in Buenos Aires. Florencia was also a great host! She gave us great recommendations on things to do and places to eat. There was also teas and cereals for breakfast, which were delicious. Overall, we had a wonderful time.

This condo is really nice and also fully equipped. Modern, clean and in a really nice neighborhood. The breakfast at OuiOui on the corner is a must-do! Although I arrived after midnight, Florencia and Raphael came over and help me settle in incl. some basics for breakfast and even beer and snacks... In short they made me feel welcome instantly.... You can't go wrong here!
reviews.response: Thanks Marcel!! Have a good time!!! Nice to meet you!!

reviews.comments: This was a wonderful experience. The apartment was clean, and exactly as advertised. While we never met our hosts, they communicated promptly and clearly with us, made us feel welcome, and even provided some light snacks and beverages for us on arrival. My wife and I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again in the future. Gracias :-)
reviews.response: Thanks! I waiting for you the next time you came yo Argentina!!

reviews.comments: I really enjoyed my stay at Florencia's apartment. When I arrived I had the pleasure of meeting Florencia, her husband and their two children. In addition to the tea, coffee and alfajores they left for me, they also kindly gifted me a bottle of wine which was a very nice welcoming touch. The apartment was clean, stylish and perfectly located. I stayed for over a month and Florencia arranged for the  apartment to cleaned once per week, supplying me with fresh bed linens and towels. I liked the apartment so much that I extended my stay for a further few days.
reviews.response: gracias Grant! te esperamos a tu vuelta por Buenos Aires!! buen año!!

reviews.comments: Florencia was a great host who was very responsive to all requests. Location of the apt is good and within walking distance to subte station, restaurants and bars/clubs.
reviews.response: Thanks Jacob! Have a nice new year!

reviews.comments: The apartment is beautiful and in a fantastic area. Flor was very responsive to our needs, which was much appreciated. We would definitely stay there again.
Great and comfortable studio, very well located. Florencia was very quick in responding to our last minute request. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend Florencia's studio to our friends
